name: df-cn
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(ccn, cmpo(s0, s1, ctop, ctop, crab(s2, co(cuni(cv(s1)), cmap, cuni(cv(s0))), wral(s3, cv(s1), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s2)), cv(s3)), cv(s0))))))
comment: Define a function on two topologies whose value is the set of continuous mappings from the first topology to the second. Based on definition of continuous function in [Munkres] p. 102. See ~ iscn for the predicate form. (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2006.)
